attributes.additional_details:
An e-petition has been created seeking to 'amend the NPPF before irreversible damage is caused to our communities'.

This e-petition calls for the government to resist any amendments to the NPPF on the basis that it makes sufficent provision for the econonmic, social and environmental factors to be considered in the assessment of sustainable development, and, importantly, because further planning reform would be unnecessarily disruptive to all involved in the process.
